long_description: The Victorinox CH 25 wheeled upright lets you expand its depth from 8.25 to 9.25 in. when you need some extra space. 1-touch, dual-trolley aluminum handle system recesses into bag when not in use. Spacious main compartment expands 2 in. for additonal packing capacity. Interior mesh compression straps feature a zippered pocket for additional organization. Large interior door pocket features a U-shape opening and internal mesh zip pocket. Top zippered exterior compartment is ideal for tickets and other accessories. External strap system compresses the bag and adds additional security. Inline skate wheels on the Victorinox CH 25 provide a smooth roll and easy handling. Rear corner guards and plastic kick plate protect vulnerable areas of bag. Travel Sentry(R)-approved luggage lock secures belongings and allows U.S. airport security screeners to open the lock without destroying it and relock it after inspection. Removable Attach-a-Bag strap secures an additional bag (not included) to the front of the CH 25 for consolidated travel.
short_description: The Victorinox CH 25 wheeled upright lets you expand its depth from 8.25 to 9.25 in. when you need some extra space.
